item.title: Time Value of Money in R
item.description: In this article we will perform basic financial calculations in R. Calculating the Net Present Value (NPV) Financial problems such as valuing an asset can be solved by calculating its net present value. The underlying principle in the calculation is that a dollar today is worth more than a dollar a year from now. This principle was well known to our ancestors thousands of year ago.
